description.en:
The course will treat public speaking as part of communication based on the four main social codes of human perception:
1. VOICE
2. SPEECH
3. FACIAL EXPRESSION
4. BODY LANGUAGE
In addition, we pay attention to holistic breathing and to various aspects of communication.
description.et:
Kursusel käsitletakse avalikku esinemist kui osa suhtlemiskultuurist, mis põhineb inimese mõistmise neljal peamisel suhtluskoodil:
1. HÄÄL
2. KÕNE
3. NÄOILME
4. KEHAKEEL
Lisaks pöörame tähelepanu terviklikule hingamisele ning erinevatele suhtlusaspektidele.

objectives.en: You want to be understood, right? And you want to be successful?
objectives.et: Sa ju tahad olla arusaadav? Sa ju tahad, et Sind mõistetakse? Sa ju tahad olla edukas?

objectives.en: I am here to help you! Together we will shape your personal essential communication skills, look for solutions to problems related to speech and body language and prepare you for public communication/public speaking.
objectives.et: Ma aitan Sind! Kujundame koos isikliku suhtlemisoskuse põhioskusi, leiame kõne- ja kehakeele probleemidele lahendusi ning valmistame Sind ette avalikuks suhtlemiseks/avalikuks esinemiseks.

objectives.en: Public speaking - it is all about communication!

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows and is able to use terms and concepts related to public speaking;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab ja oskab kasutada avaliku esinemisega seonduvaid mõisteid ja oskussõnu;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) is able to identify differences between written and rhetorical text;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab välja tuua kirjaliku ja retoorilise teksti erinevused;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows the main elements of the public speaking process;
5) knows the different levels of the communication process;
6) applys the right call-building rules and different methods;
learning_outcomes.et: 6) rakendab õigeid kõne ülesehitamise reegleid ning erinevaid meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 7) is able to compile a speech based on the type of the auditorium;
learning_outcomes.et: 7) oskab koostada kõnet lähtuvalt auditooriumi liigist;

learning_outcomes.en: 8) knows the most common types of official and event speeches, their structure and possible methods of preparing them;
learning_outcomes.et: 8) teab enamlevinud ametlike ja sündmuskõnede liike, ülesehitust ning võimalikke meetodeid nende kavandamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 9) is able to read the partner's external and internal parameters;
learning_outcomes.et: 9) oskab lugeda partneri väliseid ja sisemisi parameetreid;

learning_outcomes.en: 10) reflects on their performance technique, control and shape it consciously;
learning_outcomes.et: 10) reflekteerib oma esinemistehnikat, kontrollib ja kujundab seda teadlikult;

learning_outcomes.en: 11) values the possession of the art of speech.
